definition[0]: the side of an animal’s or person’s body, between the ribs and the hip
definition[1]: the side of an army in a battle, or a sports team when playing
example[0]: We were attacked on our left flank.
definition[2]: the side of a hill, mountain, or very large building
definition[3]: to be on both sides of someone or something
example[1]: Lewis entered flanked by two bodyguards.
